justaraftmod.config.title: Just Another Raft Config
justaraftmod.configuration.SinkTheRaft.t: Changing this to true makes the raft sink if there's 2 entities on it. (Default: false)
Changing this to false makes rafts the same speed as on land while on a slippery block. (Default: true)
justaraftmod.configuration.SpeedMultipli: Adjusting this setting changes the speed of the raft. (Default: 1.0) [Lower than 1 = slower | higher than 1 = faster]
justaraftmod.configuration.TurnMultiplie: Adjusting this setting changes the speed of turning the raft. (Default: 1.0) [Lower than 1 = slower | higher than 1 = faster]
